knimeNode.name: Jira History
knimeNode.shortDescription: Jira Adapter, ImpressiveCode DePress Plugin Framework.

fullDescription.intro:
This node can be used to read history from Jira story link.
Jira is defect tracking software, developed by Atlassian . It uses web-based user interface, which allows gathering all previously registered software defects, filtering them using custom settings and export in various formats, also in XML format which is required for using this node.
To download history connect Node Jira Offline.
Please check workflow examples here.
Copyright (c) ImpressiveCode, DePress Project

ports.outPort: Datatable just read from the jira entries file
